title: Secaputs in Quarkus Configuration
summary: This documentation provides comprehensive guidance on managing secrets within Quarkus configurations. It outlines how to encrypt sensitive configuration values like passwords and tokens using `io.smallrye.config.SecretKeysHandler`. The documentation covers the process of encrypting values, storing them securely using Java KeyStore, and accessing these encrypted values in application code. Key components include adding dependencies for cryptographic operations, configuring Quarkus with CLI tools, and protecting KeyStore passwords.
